title: Request of new feature
author: aaljaseem
body_snippet:
Hello everyone,

I am a Mobaxterm user. But that is a payed tool where i cat save more than limited number of sessions.
Now i am trying out ,mRemoteNG but the pain point that mRemoteNG has is a ftp side bar. This feature is very handy with linux machines where you can drag and drop files from and to the remote machine.

Also there is a monitoring bar down of the screen. It would be really handy also to have it.
![mobaxterm](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/20978632/90394650-5343fb...

comments.snippet:
my question is if i enter a path in the right command line, will side bar go to the same path too?

or if double click side bar to a child folder, will the terminal go in to that folder?
comments.author: VShawn

comments.snippet:
Hi

In mobaxterm the is option sothat the ftp side bar should follow the path

Looking forward to hear from you

Kind regards
Al-Jassem Anas
